PerformanceEntryStartTime.summary: The read-only startTime property returns the first {{domxref("DOMHighResTimeStamp","timestamp", "", "no-code")}} recorded for this {{domxref("PerformanceEntry","performance entry", "", "no-code")}}. The meaning of this property depends on the value of this entry's .
